name: Shopaholic Paris —Fashion Dress Up & Makeover
description:
Paris Balance your budget daily as you build up a super-fashionable wardrobe! Click on a shop to enter it, then browse the available options. Make sure to check out all the color and pattern variations. To purchase an item, click on the shopping cart.
To check out your recent purchases, click the portrait (bottom left). Try an item on by clicking the tank-top icon, or sell an item by clicking the money icon. To continue shopping, click the shopping bags (bottom left).
Make sure to upload your favorite ensembles by clicking the camera icon! Here you'll also see a final price tag for your fashion statement.
And scoop up those bags of money that are lying around on the street for some extra cash in hand!
